DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Evaluating The Processing Or Breakdown Of GW679769 In Subjects With Hepatic Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy mild moderate hepatic impairment Females : Nonchildbearing ( hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy , postmenopausal ) , childbearing ( negative pregnancy test , abstinence , doublebarrier contraception , vasectomized partner ) Negative Hepatitis B C ( healthy subject ) Negative drug , alcohol HIV test Exclusion criterion : Fluctuating rapidly deteriorate hepatic function abnormal kidney function Encephalopathy Active peptic ulcer disease Drug alcohol abuse Pregnant lactate Esophageal bleed Heart failure Infection
DOC.keyword: emesis liver problem hepatic impairment GW679769
